thread.title: Jeremy McConnell loads up on goodies for baby Caben-Albi – AND birthday girl Stephanie Davis
thread.title_full: Jeremy McConnell loads up on goodies for baby Caben-Albi – AND birthday girl Stephanie Davis

author: Emmeline Saunders
title: Jeremy McConnell loads up on goodies for baby Caben-Albi – AND birthday girl Stephanie Davis
text:
Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Jeremy McConnell has been spotted picking out a load of presents for his brand new baby boy, Caben – and for his ex-girlfriend Stephanie Davis , who celebrates her 24th birthday today. 
The Irish model, 27, who acknowledged Caben was his own child after a paternity test, was seen in Liverpool picking up gifts for his new family. 
Wearing a bright orange hoodie, a black cap and jeans, Jeremy perused the shelves at the Disney store, a children's shoe shop and jewellery shop Swarovski. Jeremy was seen shopping in Liverpool He paid a visit to a number of shops The Irish model stocked up on presents for Caben 
In the pictures, taken a day before the funeral of Jeremy's father, the ex- Celebrity Big Brother star carried a number of bags after a successful shopping spree, while his friend Ray Quinlan toted an enormous cuddly bear for the six-week-old boy. 
Having spent some time in Liverpool, both Jeremy and Steph flew to Dublin to lay Jez's father to rest. 
Eugene Cooke had been suffering from cancer and died last week, just two months after becoming a granddad. Jeremy also headed to a jewellery store He was seen looking at the displays of jewellery On the lookout for a present for Stephanie? He perused the earrings And was spotted having a long look around the store 
In a statement, Jeremy's rep said: "On Friday 3rd March 2017 Jeremy McConnell 's father passed away after a short battle with cancer. 
"We ask that Jeremy is given space and privacy at this incredibly sad time." 
Steph's appearance at the family funeral prompted speculation that she and Jez could be rekindling their romance following a rocky few months. Jezza also visited a shoe shop He and a friend left with plenty of shopping bags It's thought Jeremy picked up some clothes for his baby son His friend carried a massive teddy bear - presumably for Caben 
But a source exclusively revealed to Mirror Celeb the true nature of their relationship. 
"Steph is supporting the father of her child at this difficult time but at the moment they are not a couple," said our insider. The Irish model also stopped off at Toys R'Us And popped into the Disney store Like us on Facebook
